channel.title: Requesting a Gfx Designer
channel.description:
I need a Gfx design for my upcomming server. You will need to know how to make [size=12pt][u][i]Custom SPRITES[/i][/u][/size] (ex:magic buttons(sprites) Banners,Backrounds Etc. You will get ur own rank in-game and on-forums Add me on skype for more details
skype:canning1231

item.title: Requesting a Gfx Designer
item.dc:creator: @im6s im6s
item.description:
@im6s wrote:

Hi, I do GFX… Add me on skype - imChaoz - Here is my portfolio - chaozeffects.carbonmade.com

Read full topic

item.title: Requesting a Gfx Designer
item.dc:creator: @Team_Rocket Team_Rocket
item.description:
@Team_Rocket wrote:

Uncalled:

you quickly got on the defensive there, Rocket.

I take accusations like this quite seriously. In retrospect I suppose I did overreact a little bit, but I don’t like people who fabricate complete falsehoods.

item.title: Requesting a Gfx Designer
item.dc:creator: @Chanceperfectrsps Chanceperfectrsps
item.description:
@Chanceperfectrsps wrote:

[quote=“ox random xi, post:12, topic:467723”][quote author=PvPXile link=topic=584666.msg4159164#msg4159164 date=1352910743]

“one of the most unique Servers ever”

Please, enlighten me on how your Server will be so unique.

i’m not releasing any thing yet, in a day or two i’l make a development thread.

I’d love to hear your ideas or what you have completed/planned. I’m sort of the go-to-guy when it comes to things like this. Private Message me if you like, I’ll give you honest constructive feedback and collaborate with you if you wish.

You stole our ideas. Dont expect any more.
[/quote]
How the hell did you seriously think we’d steal your ideas?
P.S. we wouldn’t want them if you OFFERED THEM.[/quote]

just ignore Pwn he’s being a imbecile and don’t know what he’s talk about.

Read full topic
